sharedText.privacyNote: You can change these anytime in Settings.

intro_welcome.headline: Welcome
intro_welcome.body: Build a steady prayer routine with gentle reminders, qibla guidance, and simple learningâ€”at your pace.

prayer_knowledge.headline: Do you know how to pray?
prayer_knowledge.body: Choose what fits you today. Weâ€™ll tailor the experience.

yes_i_know.label: Yes, I know
yes_i_know.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll focus on consistency, reminders, and trackingâ€”so your routine stays strong.

im_learning.label: Iâ€™m learning
im_learning.feedbackBody: Small steps add up. Weâ€™ll guide you with clear, bite-sized lessons and practice support.

no_not_yet.label: Not yet
no_not_yet.feedbackBody: No worries. Weâ€™ll help you learn from the basics with patience and clarity.

support_needed.headline: Do you need support to stay consistent with prayer?
support_needed.body: Choose your comfort levelâ€”thereâ€™s no judgment.

yes_i_need_support.label: Yes, I want support
yes_i_need_support.feedbackTitle: You donâ€™t have to do this alone
yes_i_need_support.feedbackBody: Support makes consistency easier. We can set up motivation that feels right for you.

some_support.label: Maybe a little
some_support.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll keep it lightâ€”gentle reminders and simple goals that wonâ€™t overwhelm you.

im_good.label: Iâ€™m good
im_good.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll stay out of your way and keep things clean and focusedâ€”only what you need.

learn_islam.headline: Would you like to learn more about Islam?
learn_islam.body: Pick a directionâ€”your feed can be personalized.

quran_surahs.label: Qurâ€™an & Surahs
quran_surahs.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll suggest short surahs, meaning highlights, and a gentle reading routine.

basics.label: Islam basics
basics.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll cover essentials in clear stepsâ€”belief, worship, and daily practice.

im_good.label: Iâ€™m good for now
im_good.feedbackBody: You can explore learning later. Weâ€™ll keep the focus on your prayer journey.

why_here.headline: Why are you here today?
why_here.body: Select all that apply. Weâ€™ll personalize your setup.

pray_5_times.label: Pray 5 times daily
pray_5_times.feedback: Weâ€™ll prioritize prayer times, streak-friendly goals, and practical reminders.

track_progress.label: Track my progress
track_progress.feedback: Weâ€™ll set up simple tracking and reflectionsâ€”focused on improvement, not perfection.

learn_how_to_pray.label: Learn how to pray
learn_how_to_pray.feedback: Weâ€™ll add step-by-step prayer guidance with short lessons and practice prompts.

just_checking.label: Just checking it out
just_checking.feedback: Take your time. Weâ€™ll keep the experience light until youâ€™re ready.

attribution.headline: Where did you hear about us?
attribution.body: This helps us improve and support more people.

friend_family.label: Friend or family
friend_family.feedbackBody: Word of mouth means a lot. May it be a benefit for everyone.

social_media.label: Social media
social_media.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll keep sharing helpful contentâ€”in a calm, respectful way.

app_store_search.label: App Store / Search
app_store_search.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll do our best to make your experience clear, simple, and useful.

masjid_community.label: Masjid / community
masjid_community.feedbackBody: Community support is powerful. May Allah strengthen our bonds.

online_article.label: Article / blog / website
online_article.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll keep the experience thoughtful and practical.

other.label: Other
other.feedbackBody: Thanks for sharing. You can tell us more anytime in Settings.

location_permission.headline: Where are you praying from?
location_permission.body: Allow location to show accurate prayer times and qibla direction for your area.

onAllow.feedbackBody: Weâ€™ll use this only to help with qibla and prayer times.

onDeny.feedbackBody: You can set your city manually anytime.

notification_permission.headline: Never miss prayer times
notification_permission.body: Turn on notifications for prayer reminders, gentle nudges, and important updates you choose.

onAllow.feedbackBody: Reminders are on. You can customize the tone and schedule anytime.

onDeny.feedbackBody: You can enable reminders later in Settings whenever youâ€™re ready.

all_set.headline: Youâ€™re all set
all_set.body: Weâ€™re with youâ€”one prayer at a time. May your journey be steady and full of barakah.

socialProof.note: Social proof text should be used only if you can verify this rating in your product.

splash.headline: {{APP_NAME}}
splash.subheadline: A calm space to support your salah, step by step.

friends_motivation_modal.headline: Motivation with friends
friends_motivation_modal.body: Invite friends to encourage each other, share gentle check-ins, and celebrate progressâ€”without pressure.
